body.name: UNITE Hair 7SECONDS Shampoo, 10 fl.Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 26 mins
features: Daily use for all hair types
body.description: Product Description Quench thirsty, dry hair with 7SECONDS Shampoo, a moisture-enriched shampoo that gently cleanses and protects hair from UV, thermal damage and color fading. It contains coconut to gently cleanse hair, plus Pro-vitamin B12 and vegetable proteins to help increase shine and strengthen. Brand Story UNITE is a Professional Salon Hair Care System developed by a hairdresser for hairdressers, with over 40 high-quality, high-performance formulas top salon and editorial stylists demand for their craft, and for their clients.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 7SECONDS Moisturizing System Be ready for a life changing experience of healthy, MOISTURE enriched hair, with beautiful and bouncy SHINE.

est. 2003 UNITE Hair was founded in 2003 on the belief that beautiful hair starts with great products. CEO and Founder, Andrew Dale used his experience as a celebrity hairdresser to develop an award-winning, top-performing and easy-to-use collection that caters to all hair types. no bad stuff, just good results. The American-made line contains over 45 versatile and cruelty-free products made without parabens, sodium chloride, sulfates, harsh chemicals, and residues. 3.5+ Million Bottles So good, the OG product 7SECONDS Detangler is still a staple since making its debut 17 years ago. To date, the detangler, conditioner and UV + protectant hybrid has sold 3.5 million bottles (and counting).

7SECONDS Shampoo 10 fl.Oz 7SECONDS Conditioner 8 fl.Oz 7SECONDS Detangler 8 fl.Oz 7SECONDS BlowOut Crème 7 fl.Oz 7SECONDS Glossing 6 Oz 7SECONDS Masque 4 Oz Hair Benefit Cleanses, Adds Moisture & Protects Adds Shine, Moisture & Protects Adds Moisture, Detangles & Seals the Cuticle Controls Frizz & Protects Adds Instant, Weightless Shine & Protects Restores Elasticity, Moisturizes & Protects Extension Safe ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hair Type All Hair Types All Hair Types All Hair Types All Hair Types All Hair Types All Hair Types Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Wet, Damp or Dry Hair? Wet Wet Wet or Dry Damp Dry Wet Key Ingredients Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (Coconut), Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate (Coconut), Sodium Lauroamphoaceta-te (Coconut), Panthenol (ProVitamin B12), Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein (Vegetable) Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Argan Seed), Sugar Cane, Orange Extract, Lemon Extract, Apple Extract (Natural Fruit Extracts), Camellia Sinensis Extract (Green Tea Leaf), Butyrosperumum Parkii Butter (Shea), Sunflower Seed Extract (Sunflowers) Water Soluble Silicone Blend (Mineral), Gluten-Free Hydrolyzed Rice Protein (Rice), Panthenol (ProVitamin B)) Hydroxyethylcellu-lose (Plant), Hydrogenated Castor Oil (Castor Seed Oil), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Polyquaternium-59 (Organic Polymer), Glycerin (Vegetable) Helianthus Annuus Seed Extract (Sunflower Seed), Phenyltrimethicone Trimethylsiloxyam-odimethicone (Minerals), Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanteriol-Keravis (Vegetable) Shea Butter (Shea Tree), Ricinus Communis Seed Oil (Castor Bean), Hydrolyzed Keratin (Protein), Amino Acids (Protein), Amber Extract (Natural Amber), Blend of Rice and Soy Protein (Rice and Soy)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best shampoo ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo. I have oily, straight and thick hair. No shampoo ever made my hair feel clean for very long. Until now! This shampoo is keeping my hair cleaner for longer and it extending washings every time I use it. I don't use conditioner because my hair tends to be oily so it is onlynthe shampoo that I am reviewing. This shampoo is moisturizing without being heavy. I can't say enough about this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes hair so soft
reviews.reviewText: My hair was super dry and frizzy and I needed something to help. I've used so many shampoo's and nothing helped. My first wash I saw an immediate improvement, my hair was so soft. The second wash made it even smoother. I LOVE THIS SHAMPOO!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A light-weight shampoo that finishes so clean.
reviews.reviewText: I use a nickle-size dollop of this shampoo with lots of water in my hair. It lathers up nicely, then I rinse and repeat. Some shampoos make my hair feel heavy after rinsing, but this shampoo lets the conditioner do it's job. I love the easy scent, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo for thin hair!
reviews.reviewText: I have super thin hair, so I was looking for something lightweight and more of an everyday shampoo. This is great! I have to mix in my other shampoo every now and then for a full wash, but for an everyday shampoo this one is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for wavy coarse hair
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is absolutely amazing. I have very coarse and wavy hair that generally requires a lot of work to maintain. I have never used a shampoo and conditioner like this in my life that produces results like this. I actually look forward to washing my hair because I love how soft and silky it is when I use this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best shampoo out there for my hair extensions and worth every penny. I would spend any amount to protect my hair and extensions because of the cost and this hands down is the best product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: Great product. I have fine hair but a lot of it. This product makes my hair feel clean, moisturized and not weighed down. I can go longer without washing or even having to add dry shampoo in between washes. You also don’t have to use much product because it’s concentrated. Very good quality! This will last me months

I was having a lot of hair fall and a YouTuber recommended this shampoo and conditioner to help with that. I haven’t noticed yet if it is helping with that situation but damn does it leave my scalp all nice and tidy.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is great to use and wonderful on the scape.
reviews.reviewText: Loved the shampoo, makes hair shiny and feeling great.
It smells wonderful and makes your hair feel great
Best product and I am so thankful it’s on Amazon. In stores and from the source is $$$
My favourite shampoo!! I’ve been using this shampoo for 2 years and it made such a difference on the softness of my hair.
